message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $700,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to be flexible, but I can't go lower than $900,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.
I understand your position, Alice. I will consider your offer of $900,000. However, given my financial situation, I can only agree to a price of $850,000. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
